TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListView/SelectedIndexCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListView.SelectedIndexCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示包含在 控制項中所選取項目索引的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection that contains the indexes to the selected items in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A存放區索引中的選取項目以控制項。A stores the indexes to the selected items in a control. 索引儲存在內的索引放置。The indexes stored in the are index positions within the . 存放區中顯示的所有項目控制項。The stores all items displayed in the control. 下表顯示如何的範例儲存的項目，並在範例中顯示其選取項目狀態。The following table shows an example of how the stores the items of the and shows their selection states in an example . |索引Index|項目Item|在 ListView 中的選取狀態Selection state in the ListView| |-----------|----------|-------------------------------------| |00|Item1Item1|未選取Unselected| |11|Item2Item2|已選取Selected| |22|Item3Item3|未選取Unselected| |33|Item4Item4|已選取Selected| |44|Item5Item5|已選取Selected| 根據上表中的範例下, 表會示範如何會出現。Based on the example in the previous table, the following table demonstrates how the would appear. |索引Index|ListViewItemCollection 中的選取項目的索引Index of selected item in the ListViewItemCollection| |-----------|----------------------------------------------------------| |00|11| |11|33| |22|44| 您可以使用這個類別的方法與屬性來執行各種工作的集合。You can use the properties and methods of this class to perform a variety of tasks with the collection. 方法可讓您判斷是否從索引位置是儲存在索引的其中一個。The method enables you to determine whether an index position from the is one of the indexes stored in the . 一旦您知道的項目是集合中，您可以使用方法，以判斷中的索引位置。Once you know that the item is in the collection, you can use the method to determine the position of the index in the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用， ，並成員和類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and members and the class. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含名為物件`ListView1`並名為`TextBox1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a object named `ListView1` and a named `TextBox1`. 呼叫`InitializeListView`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理常式。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 這個範例需要的事件處理常式會正確地相關聯事件。This example requires that the event handler is correctly associated with the event. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您判斷在選取的項目數目。This property enables you to determine the number of selected items in the . 然後，當您逐一查看集合的值，而且必須提供執行迴圈的反覆項目的數目，您可以使用此值。You can then use this value when you are looping through the values of the collection and need to provide a number of iterations to perform the loop. 如果的屬性設定為`false`，這個屬性會傳回 0 或 1 取決於是否已選取項目值。If the property of the is set to `false`, this property returns a value of either 0 or 1 depending on whether an item is selected.
